quotes:
Briefing complete.
Operator, you're up.

Slow is smooth.
Smooth is fast.

Two is one.
One is none.

Cover and concealment.
Know the difference.

Move with purpose.
Stop with security.

Spacing saves squads.
Stacking feeds respawns.

Angle matters.
Position matters more.

Discipline wins rounds.
Luck just visits.

If you can't see it,
don't assume it's safe.

Short bursts.
Long life.

Reload before you need it.
Rotate before you're forced.

Clear comms.
Clear intent.

One good callout
is worth ten guesses.

Mark targets.
Share information.

Objective captured.
Hold and reinforce.

Sector secured.
Push the advantage.

New orders received.
Defend the point.

Enemy pressure rising.
Fortify your angles.

Momentum confirmed.
Keep moving.

Situation critical.
Play smart, not loud.

Reinforcements steady.
Spend them wisely.

Armor threat detected.
Reposition and adapt.

Airspace contested.
Stay under cover.

Supply line established.
Keep your squad stocked.

Actual to Alpha:
Push north on my mark.

Bravo, check left.
Contact possible.

Charlie, hold this corner.
Don't overpeek.

Delta, smoke the crossing.
We move after the pop.

Need ammo at waypoint.
If you have it, drop it.

Need med at my position.
I'm pinned behind cover.

Contact front, 50 meters.
Multiple, moving right.

Eyes on objective.
Set up crossfire.

Back up, back up.
Reset the fight.

Good hit.
Confirm down and rotate.

Play the objective.
The scoreboard will follow.

No hero moves.
Only team moves.

A calm squad
beats a loud lobby.

Adapt.
Then adapt again.

Protect the push.
Protect the retreat.

Every respawn is data.
Learn, adjust, re-engage.

Don't chase highlights.
Chase outcomes.

Rules are doctrine.
Conditions are discipline.

Events are orders.
Actions are execution.

Write clean rules.
Your squad will thank you.

If the rule is vague,
the battlefield will interpret it.

Test in small steps.
Ship in confident ones.

Make it readable.
Future-you is a teammate.

When in doubt,
add logging, not bravado.

Keep your loops tight
and your intent tighter.

The toolbox is your armory.
Pick the right tool.

Grid on.
Chaos contained.

Mission ready.
Portal is listening.
